meanings.definition: To reach a climax or peak in sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: She cums quickly when she is excited.
meanings.sent2: He cums at the end of their intimate moments.
meanings.sent3: The movie's plot cums to a thrilling conclusion.
meanings.sent4: The tension cums to a breaking point in the story.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display cums to a dazzling finale.

meanings.definition: To arrive or appear at a place or event.
meanings.sent1: The train cums on time every day.
meanings.sent2: She cums to the party fashionably late.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected guest cums just in time for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The truth cums to light during the investigation.
meanings.sent5: The sun cums up over the horizon every morning.

meanings.sent1: He was embarrassed when some cums spilled on his pants.
meanings.sent2: The doctor collected a sample of cums for testing.
meanings.sent3: The prankster filled the water balloon with fake cums.
meanings.sent4: The artist used cums as a medium for his painting.
meanings.sent5: The chef accidentally added too much cums to the recipe.
